Detailed Description

template<class Real>
class mdragon::Matrix3< Real >

Matrix3 represents template 3 by 3 matrix class.

The content of matrix is in column-major order.

Parameters:
'Real' parameter defines matrix components numeric type.

Matrix3< Real > Matrix3MultiplyFast (  const Matrix3< Real > &  a,
const Matrix3< Real > &  b
)  [related]
 

Performs fast multiplication of two matrices.

This function doesn't multiply zero portion of matrices (_31,_32 elements) in optimization purposes.

Parameters:
a - first matrix.
b - second matrix.
Returns:
Returns result matrix.
